description: Ohio Gov. John Kasich says the drama swirling around the White House is the reason he refused to support President Donald Trump during the election.
title: Gov. Kasich: I hate to say I told you so ...  - CNN Video

description: Sen. Bernie Sanders and Gov. John Kasich weigh in on what they think about President Trump's ability to perform the duties of the office of President.
title: Sanders, Kasich weigh in on Trump's competency - CNN Video

author: Ashley Killough, CNN
description: Gov. John Kasich said House Speaker Paul Ryan should be more aggressive in speaking out against President Donald Trump in the wake of news that Trump asked former FBI Director James Comey to end an investigation into former national security adviser Michael Flynn.
title: Kasich: Ryan 'should be more aggressive'
